auth.loginDescription: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials to continue.

auth.mfaSubtitle: Secure your account with two-factor authentication.
auth.heroDescription: Streamline your trading workflow, track performance, and make data-driven decisions.
auth.mfaSetupVerified: Two-factor authentication has been enabled successfully.

auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.mfaDisabledDesc: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special characters

auth.setupMFADesc: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app to set up two-factor authentication.

auth.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters

trades.tradeHistoryDescription: View and manage your trading activities
trades.advancedFiltersDescription: Filter trades based on specific criteria

trades.newTradeDescription: Enter the details of your trade
trades.noTradesFound: No trades match your search criteria

insights.riskMetricsDescription: Detailed analysis of your trading risk profile
insights.varDescription: Value at Risk (VaR) represents the maximum potential loss on your portfolio at a given confidence level over a specific time period.
insights.diversityDescription: Portfolio diversity measures how your investments are distributed across different asset classes and instruments.
insights.marginDescription: Margin utilization tracks how much of your available margin is being used, which is an important risk indicator.
insights.holdingDescription: Holding period analysis shows your trade performance based on how long positions are held.
insights.kellyDescription: Kelly percentage indicates the optimal position size based on your win rate and average win/loss ratio.
insights.marketPerformanceComparisonDescription: Compare your returns with market benchmarks
insights.timeOfDayAnalysisDescription: Performance analysis based on trading times
insights.dayOfWeekAnalysisDescription: Performance analysis based on trading days

performance.detailedBreakdown: Detailed breakdown of your trading performance

admin.noRolesFound: No roles match your search criteria

settings.title: Settings
settings.securityDesc: Manage your account security and authentication
settings.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.revokeSessionDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke this session? You might be logged out if it's your current session.
settings.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive email notifications for important updates
settings.mobileNotificationsDesc: Receive push notifications on your mobile device
settings.browserNotificationsDesc: Receive notifications in your web browser
settings.priceAlertsDesc: Get notified when prices reach your target levels
settings.tradeConfirmationsDesc: Receive confirmation notifications for executed trades
settings.newsAlertsDesc: Get notified about market news and events
settings.earningsAnnouncementsDesc: Get notified about upcoming earnings reports
settings.accountActivityDesc: Receive notifications about account logins and changes
settings.apiCredentialsSecurity: Your API credentials are encrypted and securely stored. We never share your keys with third parties.
settings.connectionErrorDescription: We encountered an issue with your broker connection. Please check your credentials and try again.

alerts.alertManagementDescription: Create and manage your trading alerts
alerts.createAlertDescription: Set up an alert to notify you when specific market conditions are met
alerts.name: Name
alerts.priceAboveDescription: Alert when price rises above specified value
alerts.priceBelowDescription: Alert when price falls below specified value
alerts.percentChangeDescription: Alert when price changes by specified percentage
alerts.rsiAboveDescription: Alert when RSI rises above specified value
alerts.rsiBelowDescription: Alert when RSI falls below specified value
alerts.volumeAboveDescription: Alert when volume exceeds specified threshold
alerts.ivAboveDescription: Alert when implied volatility rises above specified value
alerts.ivBelowDescription: Alert when implied volatility falls below specified value
alerts.volChangeDescription: Alert when volatility changes by specified percentage
alerts.newsContainsDescription: Alert when news contains specified keywords
alerts.newsSourceDescription: Alert when news from specified source is published
alerts.createAlertToGetStarted: Create an alert to get started
alerts.editAlertFeatureComingSoon: The ability to edit alerts will be available soon
